localize.title: Buzzing on Youtube
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Youtube in your native language

blogPost.excerpt:
Co-hosts Whoopi Goldberg, Joy Behar, Sara Haines, Sunny Hostin and Meghan McCain react after a Minneapolis jury found the ex-officer guilty on all three counts in the death of George Floyd.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel: http://bit.ly/2Ybi4tM 

MORE FROM 'THE VIEW':
Full episodes: http://abcn.ws/2tl10qh
Twitter: http://twitter.com/theview
Facebook: http://facebook.com/TheView
Instagram: http://instagram.com/theviewabc
blogPost.body:
